TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You can't remove the disguise and are forever forgotten about after you disguise yourself.

The spaghetti gods are not happy about my wish not being granted

I wish I was the 5101th poster on this forum page.

Granted, but your computer's hard drive is burned from a virus shortly after.

I wish that when the next person corrupts my wish, they will tell me a long and detailed story about how they corrupted it. I love stories.

Granted. You walk to the store. You get hit by a ca(repeat a until story length is achieved)r. (Details here)

I wish for my first wish I made on this thread to be granted,

Granted, but you are tragically eaten alive by a giant cactus creature before you get the chance to even recall what it was.

I wish people would stop playing havoc with the laws of time.

Granted. Now there are no laws of time.

I wish my new leafbladed sword arrived sooner.

Granted it is delivered and wielded by an ninja who kills you with it

i wish for my hard drive to deliver sooner

Granted. Its snapped in half.

I wish that I was immune to all diseases

Granted. You get sucked into a jet engine.

I wish I'd stop forgetting to post my wish.

Granted. of course, your now posted wishes all end in you dying through pain

I wish this wish doesn't get corrupted

Granted. This results in a gamebreaking paradox, so a moderator edits your post to wish for something else and bans you for making a bad wish.

I wish it was warm outside.

Granted. Earths magnetic field shuts down, a massive solar flare happens, and you die in a warm way.

I wish tanks were giant chickens that launch gullets out of their beaks.

Granted. Fuel tanks, propane tanks, fish tanks, and other tanks for liquid storage become these giant chickens. This starts the Great Chicken War, in which chickens rampage over the world and the army blows them up via airplanes and tanks. The war lasts 3 years, and by the end of it a 3rd of the human population, including you, your family, your friends, and all semi-close acquaintances you have met in real life, are killed. The Earth is now covered in giant chicken feathers and chicken guts. Liquid storage also becomes non-existent, causing shortages in oil and water, along with aquariums.

I wish I could tar the Earth after the Great Chicken War

Granted. But the tar greatly increases the amount of heat absorbed from the sunlight, making earth's surface so hot the tar melts and catches fire.

I wish I had a better car.

granted, niko bellec steals it because it's yellow.

i wish medic was dead

Granted, you get killed by every heavy that ever existed because you made them ineffective.

I wish every seagull would turn into a Lockheed SR-71 Blackbird.

Granted, every beach is turned into a graveyard marked with SR-71s becuase they cannot support themselves in flight. You monster.

I wish for the ability to introduce arbitrary error into Nate Silver's predictions.
Granted, but for each introduced error, you lose one year of your life.

Granted, nothing happens.

I wish for a human-sized hamster ball.

granted, you are imprisoned within it

I wish I wasn't so bored.

Granted, but now you never have even an instant of free time for the remainder of your life.

I wish for a fan.

granted, its the adoring fan from Oblivion

I wish I didn't need sleep.

Granted. You do not sleep and die from exhaustation.

I wish every passanger plane would turn into a SSTO

Granted. Your plane gets into orbit, but It haven't got any way to de-orbit.

I wish that I knew how much wood could a woodchuck chuck if a woodchuck could chuck wood.

Granted. You find out but die from confusion.

I wish I was invincible.

Granted, you get bored of life, but you can't die.

I wish I could have a bit coin mining facility.
